## Demo

```{r Generate and Clean}
fs <- generate_flowset(folder)
clean_data(fs)
```

```{r Regenerate FlowSet}
resQC <- read.flowSet(path = "resQC/", pattern = ".*fcs")
```

```{r}
comp <- compensate_data(comp_controls, 'BV421-A|FITC-A|BV510', 1)
gs.uncomped <- GatingSet(resQC)
gs.comped <- compensate(gs.uncomped, comp[[2]])
gs.gated[[2]] <- quick_gate(gs.comped)

```
